index.title: Home
index.description: I'm Creeperkatze, a Unity game developer from Germany, with my current big project being Superslide. Currently also stumbling into web development.
index.welcome:
A Unity game developer from Germany, with my current big project being Superslide.
This website is still in early developement, and will change drastically over time.

idiot_test.title: Idiot Test - How smart are you really?
idiot_test.description: Test whether you're an idiot with these crazy and tricky questions!
idiot_test.heading: Idiot Test
idiot_test.text:
Have you ever wondered whether you're an idiot? Then you've come to the right place!
Answer all 25 questions in this online idiot test to get your result! 
But beware: not all solutions are as simple as they may seem.

description.0: You somehow managed to answer hardly any questions correctly...
description.1: Well... You're not an idiot, but you can do better!
description.2: Not bad at all! A pretty... average score.
description.3: Ok, ok, not bad... But you're still not a genius.
description.4: You answered ALL questions correctly... Respect!

share.title: Idiot Test - How smart are you really?
share.text:

christmas-quiz.title: Christmas Quiz - Test your knowledge
christmas-quiz.description: The ultimate Christmas Quiz! Test your knowledge of the history, traditions and fun facts about the most wonderful holiday of the year!
christmas-quiz.heading: Christmas Quiz
christmas-quiz.text: Are you a true Christmas expert or more of an amateur? In this entertaining online Christmas Quiz, you can expect 25 exciting questions about the history, traditions and fun facts about the most beautiful holiday of the year. Test your knowledge, find the right answers and receive your result including your rank!

description.0: You are a servant! Not even a reindeer. There's still a lot of room for improvement...
description.1: Well... At least you get to pull the sleigh!
description.2: Not bad at all! At least you're an imp... Hard-working, but not in the spotlight yet.
description.3: Ok, ok, not bad... You are an angel. A heavenly, almost perfect, performance!
description.4: You answered ALL questions correctly... Respect! You are the Christmas star, and perfectly prepared for the festive season!
